item.title: Israel's High Court Says The Government Must Stop Funding Seminaries. Could That Topple Netanyahu?
item.description: A dramatic decision by Israel's Supreme Court on drafting ultra-Orthodox men into the Israeli military could spell political trouble for Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
item.content:encoded: A dramatic decision by Israel's Supreme Court on drafting ultra-Orthodox men into the Israeli military could spell political trouble for Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

item.title: Pope Presides Over Easter Vigil, Delivers 10-Minute Homily After Skipping Good Friday At Last Minute
item.description: Pope Francis made a last-minute decision to skip his participation in the Good Friday procession as a health precaution.
item.content:encoded: Pope Francis made a last-minute decision to skip his participation in the Good Friday procession as a health precaution.

item.title: Canadian Region Declares State Of Emergency Ahead Of Eclipse Gazer Onslaught
item.description: Ontario’s Niagara Region is expecting up to a million visitors for the solar eclipse in early April.
item.content:encoded: Ontario’s Niagara Region is expecting up to a million visitors for the solar eclipse in early April.

item.title: Man Who Allegedly Held 4 Hostages In Dutch Nightclub Has Been Arrested
item.description: Dutch authorities were "exceptionally happy" that there was a peaceful ending after four people were held hostage for hours.
item.content:encoded: Dutch authorities were "exceptionally happy" that there was a peaceful ending after four people were held hostage for hours.

item.title: Three-Ship Aid Convoy Departs For Gaza Amid Starvation Concerns
item.description: World Central Kitchen said the vessels and a barge were carrying ready-to-eat items like rice, pasta, flour, legumes, canned vegetables and proteins.
item.content:encoded: World Central Kitchen said the vessels and a barge were carrying ready-to-eat items like rice, pasta, flour, legumes, canned vegetables and proteins.

item.title: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy Fires More Aides In Ongoing Personnel Shakeup
item.description: No explanation was given immediately for the latest changes in a wide-reaching personnel shakeup over recent months.
item.content:encoded: No explanation was given immediately for the latest changes in a wide-reaching personnel shakeup over recent months.

item.title: Judge Questions Border Patrol Position That It's Not Required To Care For Children At Migrant Camps
item.description: U.S. District Judge Dolly Gee said evidence presented by migrant advocacy groups appeared to support the definition of legal custody. “Are they free to leave?” she asked.
item.content:encoded: U.S. District Judge Dolly Gee said evidence presented by migrant advocacy groups appeared to support the definition of legal custody. “Are they free to leave?” she asked.

item.title: 45 Dead After Bus Plunges Off Bridge In South Africa, Sole Survivor Is 8-Year-Old
item.description: The Limpopo provincial government said the bus veered off the Mmamatlakala bridge and plunged 164 feet into a ravine before busting into flames.
item.content:encoded: The Limpopo provincial government said the bus veered off the Mmamatlakala bridge and plunged 164 feet into a ravine before busting into flames.

item.title: UN Court Orders Israel To Open More Land-Based Aid Routes Into Gaza Strip
item.description: Aid packages airdropped into Gaza have reportedly led to deaths of people trying to recover them.
item.content:encoded: Aid packages airdropped into Gaza have reportedly led to deaths of people trying to recover them.

item.title: Norwegians Hoarding Swedish Eggs For Easter Amid Holy Week Shortage
item.description: One Swedish supermarket was forced to limit the number of eggs purchased to three 20-packs per household.
item.content:encoded: One Swedish supermarket was forced to limit the number of eggs purchased to three 20-packs per household.

item.title: Doctors Visiting Gaza Hospital Stunned By Violence's Toll On Palestinian Children
item.description: An international team of doctors was prepared for the worst, but the Israeli military campaign's gruesome impact on children still left them shocked.
item.content:encoded: An international team of doctors was prepared for the worst, but the Israeli military campaign's gruesome impact on children still left them shocked.

item.title: Central American, Mexican Families Mourn The Workers Lost In Baltimore Bridge Collapse
item.description: The governments of Mexico, Guatemala, El Salvador and Honduras confirmed that their citizens were among the missing.
item.content:encoded: The governments of Mexico, Guatemala, El Salvador and Honduras confirmed that their citizens were among the missing.
